meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Saudi Arabia.
meanings.sent1: In Saudi Arabia, you can buy many things with riyals.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for riyals at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The riyals in my wallet were feeling lonely without any company.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of riyals.
meanings.sent5: The sound of riyals clinking together is music to my ears.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Qatar.
meanings.sent1: Do you know the exchange rate for riyals to dollars in Qatar?
meanings.sent2: She received her salary in Qatari riyals.
meanings.sent3: The riyals in Qatar seem to have a magical glow.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was as abundant as a pile of riyals.
meanings.sent5: The scent of spices in the market mingled with the smell of riyals.

meanings.definition: A coin or banknote of the currency of Yemen.
meanings.sent1: The shopkeeper handed me a handful of riyals as change.
meanings.sent2: Yemeni riyals come in different denominations.
meanings.sent3: The riyals in Yemen jingled in his pocket as he walked.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a cascade of riyals falling from the sky.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes lit up when he saw the riyals in his grandson's hand.
